observations: Strong Security Posture: Private Endpoints and disabled public network access.
Good Naming Conventions: Consistent resource naming using locals.
Centralized Configuration: Region, project names, and CIDR ranges managed in locals.
Resource Tagging: Consistent tagging for cost management and organization.
Provider Version Pinning: Prevents accidental breaking changes.
Security Recommendation: Restrict inbound HTTPS to known IP ranges instead of allowing from any source.
Security Recommendation: Implement Azure Key Vault for SQL admin password management.
General Recommendation: Consider breaking configuration into reusable Terraform modules.
General Recommendation: Utilize input variables for environment-specific values (e.g., environment, aks_min_nodes).
